response.original_title: Mankind Rising - Where do Humans Come From
response.overview: Follows mankind's journey of life from the first cell to the present day.  Captured in a single, animated time lapsed shot, and based on archeological findings, we trace our epic journey from the first spark of life billions of years ago up to our present status as the most successful species on the planet.  Humans are the pinnacle of a chain of species that has survived by way of evolution, natural selection, adaptation, and pure luck.  From the formation of primordial genetic material to the development of speech, this is the improbable story of the incredible set of circumstances that led to human existence.
response.title: Mankind Rising - Where do Humans Come From
